description:
Choose from a variety of available pictures and place the puzzle pieces together to reveal an illustrations. When you feel ready, try increasing the difficulty level to earn all the badges! 

Features:
★ 40 Mermaid-themed Illustrations
★ 4 levels of puzzle difficulty
★ Smart interface designed for kids
★ Natural dynamics of puzzle placement
★ Develops fine logic and motor skills
★ Soothing, relaxing music helps to concentrate

Play with friends to increase the fun!
name: Mermaid Story
